title: [Champion Concept] Olim, The ghostly god of war (dream realm champion)
body:
**Short info**

He is from the [Dream Realm](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/AEW61QT7-themed-concepts-creatures-from-the-dream-realm).
He was reborn in [Plane of Sanity](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/twE2nEEL-themed-concepts-creatures-from-the-dream-realm-part-ii).
He originally was Rakkor warrior, but after his death memories of him reformed inside of the Dream Realm recreating him in a ghostly form.
He managed to escape the Dream Realm and get back to Runeterra through failed summoning ritual of newbie summoner.
Only thing resembling war is the league of legends, so he joins it to feel alive again.

#**COMBAT**

**Attack range:** 200

~~ ~~
> **Passive: Ghostly Aegis:** reduce damage you take from basic attacks from enemy champions by 5%. In addition, after being hit 5 times with basic attack from enemy champion, automatically block 6th basic attack.

~~ ~~
> **Masterful Impale [q]**
> Charge at your target impaling him/her dealing 60/100/140/180/220 (+120% of attack damage) physical damage and suppressing him/her for 1,2 sec while performing no other actions. You can reactive this ability again to throw your suppressed enemy in chosen direction.
> **Cooldown:** 15/14/13/12/11 sec
> **Mana cost:** 50
> **Range:** 365
> **Throw range:** 280

~~ ~~
>**Phantom Barrier [w]**
> Slowly generate shield increasing in power by 20/35/50/65/80 (+15% of ability power) every sec for 5 sec. After shield is fully built it will lasts for 6 sec.
> **Cooldown:** 20/19/18/17/16 sec
> **Mana cost:** 80

~~ ~~
> **Ghostly Shout [e]**
> Reduce movement speed of nearby enemies by 5/10/15/20/25% and increase movement speed of nearby allies (you included) by 4/6/8/10/12% for 3 sec.
> **Cooldown:** 14/13/12/11/10 sec
> **Mana cost:** 55/58/61/64/67
> **Range:** 420

~~ ~~
> **Ghost of War [r]**
> Become untargetable and immune to all damage for 2,5 sec transforming into pure ghostly energy. While transformed you can move, but can not attack. Upon exiting this form deal 200/275/350 (+160% of attack damage) (+100% of ability power) magic damage to all nearby enemies around you.
> **Cooldown:** 120/110/100 sec
> **Mana cost:** 110/120/130
>**Range:** 395

~~ ~~
Build examples:
1) {{item:3047}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3022}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3078}} 
2) {{item:3047}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3078}} 
3) {{item:3006}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3742}} 

****
His friends: {{champion:80}}

replies.body: Weren't summoners retconned..?

> [{quoted}](name=Zair Umbras,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2015-11-01T21:30:01.383+0000)
>
> Weren't summoners retconned..?

That is just random summoned, like a normal mage or something.
I love the background and idea of the champion, but I would rather not have another spear champion. {{champion:268}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:5}}
You have a point XD

so whose deviantart did you steal all these pics from :^)



hmmmmm? :^))))

> [{quoted}](name=Axxlon,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-11-01T19:19:08.034+0000)
>
> so whose deviantart did you steal all these pics from :^)
> 
> 
> 
> hmmmmm? :^))))

Are you trying to be a douchebag? And what do you you mean by saying "steal"? Did you imagine me going into someone's house, stealing their pc and then putting their personal info into internet?

Steal. As in take without permission. Or, take and don't source where you got it. You do this with almost all of the champion concepts you post.

For example, this image is from
http://fesbraa.deviantart.com/art/Armored-Demon-507321141

See that? That's a source. By doing this you help the person who actually did the work get recognition for it by leading people back to a place where they can find more of their work.
Good to see you're still hostile though. More stuff to report you for :)

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=000600000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T08:19:28.847+0000)

I have three things to say to you:
1) If it have multiple sources and people post it on internet, then other people using it on non-profit activity isn't count as stealing. But then again, some people might be too stupid to get that.
2) You could never prove that single source out of many is the correct one and the original.
3) It is strange that you, mister douchebag downvoter, still follow all my work and try to be hostile without a reason. Did i hurt you that bad than you now feel the need to be a douche every time i post something? No, really, how did i hurt you?

1) That doesn't make them any less in the wrong either. But you're taking someone else art and posting it on YOUR work with the express purpose of it being eye catching to people and Riot. You're stealing someone else's content for your own content with no effort to cite a source. You can't do that.
2) Except the fact that the poster sources the original image he was recreating. It literally took me 30 seconds to google.
3) I'm not being hostile. You started being hostile towards someone else, I explained why you were in the wrong. I've never called you a name or insulted you, where as you insult people on a regular basis. Yes I do follow you, but it's not like it's hard considering you post about 2 or more ideas every other day. And the reason I do is so that when you begin insulting people I can report you. **The forums doesn't need your attitude.** Fix it or face the consequences. This has nothing to do with you 'hurting me'. This is everything to do with you being rude.

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=00060000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T10:45:01.202+0000)

Ohhh, i am so scared. Little angry kid is reporting me. This is terrifying. Nooo, don't do little kiddo. Noooooo.

Yes, that was sarcasm.

And you supposed link or original creator... You just making fool out of yourself.
Which of these are the original then:

http://fesbraa.deviantart.com/art/Armored-Demon-507321141

https://www.artstation.com/artwork/armored-demon

https://plus.google.com/114724324642369700357/posts/VNr7pXYofsy?pid=6202789567768001618&oid=114724324642369700357

http://joyreactor.com/post/2131244

https://plus.google.com/photos/109870415946385882124/albums/6156826198793300593/6156826197048704082?sqi=109541689722653931325&sqsi=46640475-f7b8-477b-8a79-570410d6d01a&pid=6156826197048704082&oid=109870415946385882124

http://ucrazy.ru/foto/1429545894-narisovannaya-krasotischa-74-310.html

https://fesbra.artstation.com/portfolio/armored-demon

Who is original creator which should be "By doing this you help the person who actually did the work get recognition for it". Who? You say stuff you have no idea about. Do you have no better thing to do, kiddo?

Bahaha you didn't even bother to read your own links, did you?

The first link you post is to a website with an artist named Felipe Escobar (seen on the right). Going to his site (click his name) and you get this link: https://www.artstation.com/artist/fesbra

See the "Fesbra" on the end?

It's the same name as the deviantArt account I linked back to: http://fesbraa.deviantart.com/art/Armored-Demon-507321141

**It's the original artist's deviantArt acount.**

The last link you posted ( https://fesbra.artstation.com/portfolio/armored-demon ) is the same site as your first link, it is just the original artist's personal page. If you go to your first link, underneath the artist personal details is a blue box. Try clicking that.

So thank's for proving me right :) Do you not have anything better to do than to post up 3 ideas every other day and argue with people who tell you how you can improve them?

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0006000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T12:00:22.319+0000)

Would you bet your life that he is original creator? Because there is tons more link with tons of other people who posted this picture.

I post because i can, are you offended by that? That is why you angry?

First, thank you for acknowledging that you were wrong.
Yeh I would. He is an artist for a living, and they know better than to steal peoples work because the second you are caught doing it your career is over.
I guarantee you that artists at Riot wouldn't dream of posting content that wasn't theirs without either expressly recognising the original artists.
And yes I'm sure there are, just like you took his work without bothering to source it, so have many others.

And I report because I can. Is that why you're so hostile? Because I've told you before and I'll keep telling you: I'll stop reporting when you stop abusing people.

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=000600000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T12:46:50.893+0000)

1) How that reporting is going for you? Hmm? Riot probably thinks you are just random angry kid by now, because none of my thread were removed. You can report all you want: me and every other person in the world knows that you are just being silly.

2) Where did i said that i drew it? Show me. Where did i said that? You know that stealing is taking something from other person and claiming it is yours. I know you must be young and reading might be hard for you, but not even once i said that i drew that picture.

3) Keep reporting, maybe riot fill get annoyed with you and block you from this forum.

1) Hopefully making progress. All I can keep doing is report and hope they finally realise how toxic you are.

2) Never said you drew it. Show me. Where did I say you drew it? Stealing is taking something from others without their permission. Going back to what originally started this you **didn't source the persons work**. You posted other peoples work as** part of **your own work. If you were to do this in a professional context you would be out of a job. Please read carefully.

3) We will see in time I guess. :)

> [{quoted}](name=Lonely Flame,realm=OCE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=00060000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T14:24:16.758+0000)

K, i shouldn't feed trolls. This one is extremely hungry one, i see.

What troll? I'm trying to tell you to source your images and fix your attitude. Again I haven't insulted you or put you down. I explained things to you and answered questions.

But again, **thank you for acknowledging that you were wrong. **I know it's hard to admit sometimes, but by blowing me off like that you just show you realised you had no argument and so you gave up. It's funny how it's only now, after I answered your questions and you didn't answer mine (because that would mean admitting you were wrong and I was right), that now is a bad time to 'feed trolls.'
...Wow. Ok then. Congrats man. I didn't think it was possible but you've hit a new low point hahaha. But thank you. Keep talking so I have more to report :)

I'm not harassing him. He didn't understand the concept of sourcing an image and why that's important so I explained it to him.
And no, are you? I don't even know how this is an insult.

> [{quoted}](name=zemaxs,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=00060000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-02T15:53:18.645+0000)
>
> Why are you harassing a guy for a pick? Are you gay or something?

He probably is. He does everything to get my attention and tries that "i insult you to get your self-esteem down for you to become vulnerable" tactics. Too bad that doesn't work and i am not homosexual.

I bet he is lonely :DD
Why are you harassing a guy for a pick? Are you gay or something?
His Q is op!! Its like an InSec without ward hop! omg dude maybe a little overboard

> [{quoted}](name=yolohoboswagnoob,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-11-03T03:47:38.223+0000)
>
> His Q is op!! Its like an InSec without ward hop! omg dude maybe a little overboard

I already explained to other guy why nothing in his kit is OP. I am not doing that again.

I think his Passive is too similar to Pantheon's passive

His Q seems to have too good of an AD scaling

Besides that, I think he's good.

Seems like a good support. And would be a pretty good AD support like we've been looking for.

Though his builds including BotRK I don't like much... he has no ratios on E and no AD(and really small AP) on W, but his Q and R have tremendous ratios making up for it, not to mention he could build crit to make up for the lost AA damage in BotRK.

> [{quoted}](name=Coriandr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:37:00.778+0000)
>
> Seems like a good support. And would be a pretty good AD support like we've been looking for.
> 
> Though his builds including BotRK I don't like much... he has no ratios on E and no AD(and really small AP) on W, but his Q and R have tremendous ratios making up for it, not to mention he could build crit to make up for the lost AA damage in BotRK.

I wasn't aiming for AD support, but you do have the point.

His W have pretty high AP ratio, but building AP only for that wouldn't be a good idea.

Also, i am not sure what kind of support built would for for him, though.
Defensively.  His Q is a great positioning tool, so combined with his passive you have a wall of armor (when you build him tanky) who grabs your carry and throws them to his team to be slaughtered.
His passive is a tankier and arguably better version of {{champion:80}}'s.  That'd be annoying honestly.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-01T19:50:56.722+0000)
>
> His passive is a tankier and arguably better version of {{champion:80}}'s.  That'd be annoying honestly.

Not really. Pantheon proc his passive. Enemies proc this champ's passive.
Yes but it also makes him better at fighting attack speed champions than Pantheon.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=000700000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T20:37:49.156+0000)
>
> Yes but it also makes him better at fighting attack speed champions than Pantheon.

But you can build attack speed on pantheon :D

It's usually not the biggest priority when I build Pantheon. New items may change that. 

I don't mean to disrespect your creation.   It looks a little overloaded but it's not crazy and league seems to be transitioning towards more thoughtful use of abilities. I just see some things that would be interesting to see on a Pantheon rework. 

Though your scalings feel high. Not that I'm good at scalings. Avoided them in the champion I posted since I didn't know what to think.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=00070000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T20:59:12.803+0000)


Overloaded you say? In what are it is overloaded? Also, none of scaling are high, you can check those in leagueoflegends.wikia.

120% AD on his Q and 160% on his R isn't high?  Suppression on his main damaging ability is also very powerful, they'd only be able to escape with {{item:3140}} items.  Combined with the ability to throw that target in any direction and you have yourself a scary AD support.  Now you do have these abilities on reasonably high cooldowns, though with enough points in the cunning tree and the right items you can have 45% CDR in season six, which could make this very spammable.  Which might be intended, but a spammable suppression may be too much.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T21:32:20.179+0000)
>
> 120% AD on his Q and 160% on his R isn't high?  Suppression on his main damaging ability is also very powerful, they'd only be able to escape with {{item:3140}} items.  Combined with the ability to throw that target in any direction and you have yourself a scary AD support.  Now you do have these abilities on reasonably high cooldowns, though with enough points in the cunning tree and the right items you can have 45% CDR in season six, which could make this very spammable.  Which might be intended, but a spammable suppression may be too much.

Ok, so, at 45% CDR you would be seeing 120% AD on Q with 6 sec cooldown. That 20% of AD per sec. And now we are talking about sacrificing AD for CDR. Some goes with R: 3% of AD per sec.

Now, don't forget that this is only two damage dealing abilities. Only 2 out of 4 abilities deal damage, and one is his ulty. So, on average this champ have 70% of AD per ability. What is the problem with that?

Combined with the new Essence reaver, Deaths Dance, and a couple of crit items you could build the CDR without sacrificing much damage.  

Now you probably know more than me on these scalings.  But what about the suppression?  Why do you think it's fine?

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=000700000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:28:13.342+0000)
>
> Combined with the new Essence reaver, Deaths Dance, and a couple of crit items you could build the CDR without sacrificing much damage.  
> 
> Now you probably know more than me on these scalings.  But what about the suppression?  Why do you think it's fine?

I am not familiar with new masteries and items, but i do calculations for every champion concept i make with current masteries and items. Everything is calculated, as some people say.

Suppression is like a stun, but you also will not be able to act.

Lets compare this champ with Leona and Taric:
1) This champ can suppress for 1,2 sec. He can't do anything else, but to throw his enemy reducing time of suppression.
2) Leona can stun for 1,25 sec. During this time she can do whatever she wants.
3) Taric can stun for 1,6 sec. This is a ranged stun and he still can do whatever he wants.

What is better? Hmmm? Stun or suppression?
Fair enough.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=00070000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:50:39.044+0000)
>
> Fair enough.

Told you.
Just voicing my thoughts. I didn't know much on suppressions because they are rare.

> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0007000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-11-01T22:52:57.993+0000)
>
> Just voicing my thoughts. I didn't know much on suppressions because they are rare.

Yea, so is silences, because Riot is removing these effects.

Interesting champion

E trade out the MS buff to allies and make it an AS buff instead

Ult It looks somewhat like something I tried with one of my champions I got chewed out by just about everyone who reviewed it. Most people fear this kind of ability regardless of how much you try to balance it.


Review some of my [champions](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/Vw6oEkvm-tamurs-concept-thread)

> [{quoted}](name=Tamur,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-10-31T00:01:21.322+0000)

Wow, man. Your concepts are pretty old. I am on this forum just two month now. I like your demon concept, but you should rework and repost it.

I've been working on him for almost 4 years now.  I try to spend a lot of time trying to finish a champion before moving on to the next.  any suggestion for Zimn?  Please post on his thread it just makes it easier to implement.
Nice concept!  Reminds me a lot of Pantheon, in fact, the inspiration art could be pretty easily turned into an amazing Pantheon skin.

> [{quoted}](name=Painted Celt,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=piOPk9Ja,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-10-31T00:26:08.344+0000)

Pantheon have weapon and shield in different hands, so for that weapon would need to be reversed. Also, he was from same tribe as Pantheon, so they should know each other.
Better off as a skin
